sentence: According  to  Gaza's  Health  Ministry,  at  least  17,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  and  more  than  46,000  wounded  in  Israel's  air  and  ground  campaign.
It  came  in  response  to  the  surprise  Oct.  7  attack  by  Hamas  militants  on  southern  Israel,  which  killed  1,200  people,  Israel  says.
